definition[0]: the amount of food, drink etc that you take into your body
example[1]: Sickness may develop from inadequate fluid intake.
example[2]: Try to reduce your intake of fat.
definition[1]: the number of people who join a school, profession etc at a particular time
example[3]: an intake of around 120 students each year
definition[2]: a tube, pipe etc through which air, gas, or liquid enters a machine
example[4]: a leak on the air intake to the carburettor
